name: Duck in Town: A Rising Knight
storyline: Duck, Duckson's father, takes him to Town, capital of the Duck Kingdom and home of the Duck King. Duckson wants to become the greatest Duck Knight ever. To fullfill his dream, he must explore a peculiar town, full of mysteries and weird places, meet a bunch of quirky villagers and prove that he is worth the title.
summary: Duckson arrives at Town with one dream: to become the greatest Duck Knight ever. Play as a cute duck, explore the town, meet its quirky villagers and win the squawk contest in this comedy graphic adventure!
